ai-patthana8.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.9:1.1_0: Neight of the Truth, the cause of seeing the reason for something.
ai-patthana8.9:1.1_1: Seeing the teaching of the awakening factor of tranquility.
ai-patthana8.9:1.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana8.9:2.1_0: Three on taking pleasure, relying on one side, the three supports ...
